customStages.label: Sugar Melt
customStages.instructions: Add 200g granulated sugar and 60ml water. Mix until sugar dissolves.

customStages.label: Heat & Stir
customStages.instructions: Once sugar is amber, carefully add 120ml warm heavy cream, 56g butter, 1/4 tsp salt. Mixture will bubble vigorously.

customStages.label: Cook
customStages.instructions: Cook until mixture reaches soft-ball stage (116-118Â°C). Add 1 tsp vanilla extract at end.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Let caramel cool and thicken. Pour into prepared container when done.
